sentences.en: ‘Watch out!’she shouted, as the car started to move.
sentences.cn: “小心！”汽车开动时，她大声喊道。

sentences.en: A ragged shout went up from the small crowd.
sentences.cn: 这一小群人发出了刺耳的喊叫.

sentences.en: A shout went up from the crowd at the game.
sentences.cn: 看比赛的人群中有人大声喊叫起来.

sentences.en: A small group of youths stayed behind to heckle and shout abuse.
sentences.cn: 一小群小青年没走，在起哄、叫骂。

sentences.en: He almost had to shout to make himself heard above the music.
sentences.cn: 为了压过音乐声，他几乎得大声喊才能让人听见。
我听到了远处的一声喊叫。

sentences.en: It's wrong to swear and shout.
The cabby gave vent to an angry shout.
sentences.cn: 出租车司机气得大吼一声。

sentences.en: The crowd set up a shout as the winner neared the post.
sentences.cn: 优胜者接近终点时,人群中发出一片喊叫声.

sentences.en: The driver managed to escape from the vehicle and shout a warning.
sentences.cn: 那名司机设法从车里逃了出来并大声警告别人。

sentences.en: There is no need to shout angry words at me.
There’s no need to shout! I can hear you!
sentences.cn: 用不着大声喊叫！我听得见！

sentences.en: They began to curse and shout in a babble of languages.
sentences.cn: 他们开始用不同的语言叽里咕噜地谩骂吵嚷起来。

sentences.en: They heard him give a loud shout of astonishment.
sentences.cn: 他们听见他惊奇地大叫一声.

sentences.en: they were definitely in with a shout of bringing off a victory.
sentences.cn: 他们一定有绝佳机会取得成功的。

sentences.en: We had to hammer and shout before they would open up.
sentences.cn: 我们不停地拍门、叫喊，他们才开了门。

sentences.en: Yours truly was awoken by a shout: "Ahoy there!"
sentences.cn: 鄙人被一声大喊惊醒：“喂！”

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（比赛）快结束，胜负已成定局
大叫使大家安静下来：通过高声喊叫压过或使…安静
兴致勃勃地公开谈论（私事，曾经保守的秘密）

trans.tran_en: a loud call expressing anger, pain, excitement etc
